EncryptionStandard Struct Reference

Base class for public key encryption standard classes. These classes are used to select from variants of algorithms. Note that not all standards apply to all algorithms. More...

#include <pubkey.h>

Inheritance diagram for EncryptionStandard:

Detailed Description

Base class for public key encryption standard classes. These classes are used to select from variants of algorithms. Note that not all standards apply to all algorithms.
